duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and execute world-class technology solutions for front line sales professionals and independent business partners.
Prototype, test, evaluate, and select hardware, and configure and customize software solutions.
Understand and prioritize functionality, evaluate vendors, and write epics and user stories for Agile process.
Test and deploy solutions across sales team, collecting and prioritizing feedback and issues for resolution.
Provide technical support for sales technology and applications, and participate in field tests of new releases and solutions.
Solicit and collect user feedback, communicate product market needs, and evaluate integration opportunities with new systems and technologies.
Provide reports and presentations for senior management to evaluate performance against key performance indicators.
Lead and mentor team members, and input to design of dashboards and reports for better serving the user base.
Consolidate feedback, prioritize defects, and use analytics to improve user experience and behavior.
Manage and balance occasional travel related work schedule.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Computer Technology, or related field. A combination of education, training and experience that results in demonstrated competency to perform the work may be substituted.
